enhanced_by.reason: Both methods handle the removal of attributes based on a key, with 'removeIgnoreCase' being case-insensitive.
The 'remove(int)' method directly manipulates the internal state of the Attributes object, similar to how 'remove(String)' does indirectly.
After removing an attribute, 'hasKey' can be used to verify that the attribute is no longer present.
The 'size' method can be used to verify that the number of attributes has decreased after a removal.
